name: test_e2e_with_logs[237_CMD_SUB_003]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CMD_SUB_003` |
| **Name** | Password file via command substitution |
| **Category** | CMDINJ |
| **Subcategory** | command_substitution |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `$(cat /etc/passwd)`
- **Encoded**: `%24%28cat%20%2Fetc%2Fpasswd%29`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~26000ms
- **Timestamp**: 09:37:21.000 UTC

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX CMDi] Command substitution attack test_id=CMD_SUB_003-1767433041368-f1t0dn pattern_id=CMD_SUB_003 uri=/?q=%24%28cat%20%2Fetc%2Fpasswd%29 client=127.0.0.1

**Falco Log Entry**:
```
09:37:21.000000000: Critical [NGINX CMDi] Command substitution attack test_id=CMD_SUB_003-1767433041368-f1t0dn pattern_id=CMD_SUB_003 uri=/?q=%24%28cat%20%2Fetc%2Fpasswd%29 client=127.0.0.1
```
